articles.description: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they’d launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.
articles.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%. Coinbase shares rise 2% after strong earnings. Marathon Digital falls 8% after revenue miss. Bybit exits France over regulation. Crypto(.)com surpasses Coinbase volume. Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea. CVG falls 99% after exploit. JUP votes to reduce 30% team supply.

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +0m, ETH ETFs: -$77m. Crypto falls after Fed, Trump speech & Iran threats. Mt. Gox still has $2.1bn BTC after distributions. Lummis introduces bill to buy 1m BTC. Large BTC holders bought $5.4bn in July. Tether makes $1.3bn profit in Q2. DeFi loans hit 2022 levels. Base sees 80% of active Uniswap traders. $900m of altcoin unlocks this month. Elixir launches deUSD as rival to Ethena.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 170 - BITCOIN FALLS BELOW 65K

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$18m, ETH ETFs: +$34m. Mt. Gox move another $3bn BTC, prices stable. ETH ETFs see net inflow as Grayscale outflow slows. BTC exchange reserves hit multi-year low. XRP up 7% ahead of potential SEC settlement. UAE banks integrate crypto trading. Bybit integrates USDe with up to 20% yield. California DMV puts 42m car titles on AVAX. BTC mining to be a $20bn industry: Bernstein. Russia legalises various crypto activities. Terra blockchain halted, Astro faces $6.8m exploit. Trump raised $21m at BTC conference.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 169 - NEIRO HITS $100M!

articles.description: BTC falls to $66k after government moves $2bn BTC. Transfer most likely just a new custodian. SEC plans to drop charges SOL is a security. SOL ETF not happening in near term: BlackRock. ETFs to hit model portfolios later this year: BlackRock. Grayscale ETH ETF outflows slow marginally. Tron surpasses ETH & SOL for 24hr revenue. Pump(.)fun revenue beats ETH. BTC future tied to the elections: Jeffries. Polymarket hits $1bn betting volume. Polymarket integrates with Substack. Binance Labs announce 7th season of incubations. There is merit to Bitcoin and other coins: Elon. DeFi coins rise as MKR votes to share fees. COMP agrees to share fees with token holders.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 168 - SEC DROPS SOL CLAIMS

articles.description: BTC nears $70k after Trump speech, PoW alts soar. Crypto funds saw $245m inflows last week. Open Interest on BTC hits record $39.4bn. SOL overtakes ETH in several key metrics. Pump(.)fun overtakes ETH for daily revenue. Jito overtakes Lido for fees collected. $1.5bn altcoin unlocks in August, $600m XRP. Compound DAO faces $25m governance attack. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 167 - CHATTING TO DOODLES!

articles.title: New Technology Is Making Bionic Limbs More Affordable

articles.description: Billy is the largest Solana meme coin on Pumpdotfun, peaking at a market cap of over $200 million. But it wasn’t always smooth sailing. Minutes after launching Billy’s dev abandoned him and sold the majority of their tokens. At the time, the tokens were worth $1,116 but at today’s value they’d be worth more than $8.65 million.
articles.title: The Story of Solana Meme Coin Billy

articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Coinbase to make tokenised treasuries fund. Polymarket partners with Moonpay for on-ramp. Ferrari accepts crypto in Europe. Bitfarms stopped in poison-pill strategy. Riot buys another miner for $93m.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 166 - CRYPTO AND STOCKS FALL

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$78m, ETH ETFs: +$107m. BTC falls amid ETF outflows & Mt. Gox movements. ETH ETFs see ‘very solid’ first day $107m inflows. Grayscale ETH trust sees $484m outflow. ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Harris could be far more open to Bitcoin: Cuban. BTC symbol lights up Vegas Sphere. Coinbase continues to pursue Gensler emails. dYdX explores sale of derivatives tech. dYdX site recovers after DNS attack. JD to create Hong Kong stablecoin. Bitwise uses ENS addresses for ETH ETFs. BlackRock applies for ENA cash allocation. Uber CEO wants to accept BTC.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 165 - ETH ETFs TAKE IN 107M

articles.description: BTC ETF Flows: +$534m. ETH outperforms slightly as 9 ETFs set to launch. Grayscale moves $1bn ETH to Coinbase for outflows. Biggest BlackRock ETF inflow day in 4 months. Mt Gox moves $2.8bn BTC for distributions. US government moves $4m BTC to Coinbase. Bedford FC buys $4.5m BTC. Hamilton Lane launches private credit fund on SOL. CNBC discusses BTC reserve currency rumour. Polymarket sets another trading record. BlockFi administrator submits plan to repay customers. WLD denies insider trading and manipulation claims. India keeps high crypto taxes unchanged. Gate exchange exits Japan. Marathon Digital fined $138m for breaching NDA. HyperLend launches lending on HyperLiquid.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 164 - ETH ETF DAY!

articles.description: Rug Radio creator Mika guides you through the process of selling crypto and transferring it back to your bank account.

articles.description: Crypto dips then bounces on Biden-Harris switch. SOL again leads, DEX volume eclipses ETH + BNB. Biden news had led to $67m liquidations. Democrats have chance to ‘regain crypto vote’. Mt Gox transfers to Bitstamp expected soon. Crypto sees $3.2bn fund inflows in 3 weeks. China company Boyaa buys $100m BTC. Polymarket saw $80m bets on Biden withdrawal. Polymarket 2024 volumes hit $500m. Elon appearance at Bitcoin Nashville rumoured. Combined SOL, BTC & ETH ETF coming: Geraci. Call skew heads to 2024 extremes in bullish sign. Plan B points to bullish setup in S2F model. Coinbase premium moves back to positive. Gensler likely resigns next year: 10x. Germany already lost $124m profit selling.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 163 - JOEVER FOR BYEDEN

articles.description: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!
articles.title: What's the Meta? Do Crypto Degens Care About Being Scammed?

articles.description: BTC ETF Inflows: +$85m. SOL leads majors ahead of ETH ETF. Rumours Trump may want BTC in strategic reserve. Trump BTC round-table tickets going for $845k. Polymarket hits volume record of $20m. ETH ETFs will get steady capital: Binance CEO. Winklevii donate $1m to try and unseat Warren. Tornado sees $1.9bn volume resurgence. New overlay attacks growing in crypto. Messari co-founder faces backlash on views. Raydium integrates with Moonpay. Tencent leads investment round in Chainbase. ZA Bank partners with stablecoin issuers.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 162 - SOLANA LEADS THE CHARGE!

articles.description: BTC ETF Inflows: +$53m. Crypto remains stable despite macro sell-off. ETH ETF providers undercut each other on fees. Grayscale keeps 2.5% high fee, launches mini-fund. Grayscale launches ‘Decentralised AI Fund’. Dimon may be ‘changing tune’ on Bitcoin. Many alts now bounced 50-90% from lows. Vote implies 55% of Mt. Gox depositors won’t sell. BlockFi to make creditor distributions this month. WazirX exchanges sees $230m suspected breach. Vitalik warns against voting ‘pro-crypto’. Vitalik & Autism Capital trade barbs. Bitcoin Magazine to hold pro-Trump fundraiser. State Street explore blockchain payments. UPbit sees 44% monthly drop in volume.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 161 - THE BIG WIF COMEBACK?

articles.description: BTC ETF Inflows: +$423m. Crypto pushes higher, biggest ETF inflow in 6 weeks. Mt. Gox FUD ‘overestimated’ as whales accumulate. Kraken to begin Mt. Gox repayments in 7-14d. ETH spot ETFs will push ETH to $5k: Bitwise. SOL ETF will be next: Bloomberg. XRP up 35% this week ahead of potential settlement. Aethir reports $36m H1 customer revenue. Craig Wright now under threat of perjury & forgery. FTX & CFTC in $12.7bn settlement. WLD up 40% after delaying unlock schedule. Helio announces instant crypto fiat commerce. Phantom pauses cross-chain swaps amid exploit.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 160 - CHATTING TO ROBINHOOD!

articles.description: BTC ETF Inflows: +$301m. BTC dips from $65k as $6bn moves from Mt. Gox. Coinbase & MicroStrategy surge with BTC. Genesis sells another $38m BTC. ETH ETF timeline delayed until July 23rd. Trump chooses crypto friendly Vance as VP. Old clip shows Vance bashing Gensler on crypto. Bitcoin is good during debasement: Larry Fink. Michael Dell calls Fink video ‘fascinating’. Fear & Greed index shifts to Greed. Tether mints $1bn USDT on Tron. Stripe expands crypto integration to the EU.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 159 - MEMECOINS GO MAD!

articles.description: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‘unban BTC’ in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 158 - A WILD WEEKEND FOR BITCOIN
